sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Divide and conquer. US Republican Kevin McCarthy is elected US House Speaker after four long days of 15 grueling rounds of voting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On the two-year anniversary of the January 6th insurrection, US President Joe Biden awards those who protected the US Capitol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A sigh of relief for U.S. Republican Kevin McCarthy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: After 15 excruciating rounds of voting, the Californian Republican has finally been named as the House Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives. The Honorable Kevin McCarthy of the state of California, having received a majority of the votes cast, is duly elected Speaker of the House of Representatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It is the first time in 100 years that the vote for Speaker of the House has not been voted in after the first round of voting in what has been a historic four days in U.S. politics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden awarded 14 individuals with the Presidential Citizens Medal for their work protecting the U.S. Capitol during the January 6th insurrection in Washington, D.C., and for overseeing the 2020 election process, despite efforts to overturn the results.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On this day of remembrance, we honor a remarkable group of Americans who embodied the best before, during, and after January the 6th, 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: America owes you, owes you all, I really mean this, a debt, a debt of gratitude, one we can never fully repay. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: January still means Christmas Eve for many Ukrainians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the western city of Mukachevo, believers gathered in the centuries-old St. Nicholas Orthodox Monastery to attend the Holy Mass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Power went out as the service drew to a close, but some stayed put to sing together in candlelight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It actually helps us when the lights are out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We return to ancient times, the liturgy sounds different, and we experience it differently, we are not complaining.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the darkness, churchgoers said their thoughts are with those on the battlefield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A local actress explained that she hopes everyone in hardship can ask the help of Jesus and can find refuge in Him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Many of Ukraine's Greek Catholics also celebrate Christmas at this time of year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local children in Mukachevo's Greek Catholic Church marked Christmas Eve with a performance of the Nativity. Two men have been hanged in Iran for allegedly killing a member of the military

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: during nationwide protests. Mohammad Mahdi Karami and Syed Mohamed Hosseini were found guilty of what Iranian authorities call corruption on earth over their alleged involvement in the death of a paramilitary officer.

sentences.sentence: Human rights groups have denounced what they described as a sham trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The EU has said it's appalled by the executions in connection with the protests that began in September sparked by the death of Masa Amini.

sentences.sentence: Fast food giant McDonald's will close its doors in Kazakhstan due to supply restrictions, according to the local franchise operator.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The chain was shut down quite quickly, and it's a shame that there were simply no good suppliers of products in Kazakhstan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's just sad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: McDonald's banned its Kazakh stores from buying meat from Russia after the war in Ukraine began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Like many other businesses in Kazakhstan, the conflict has disrupted their supply chains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Taliban have signed Afghanistan's first major public commodities extraction deal with a foreign company since taking power in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A Chinese company will drill for oil in the country's northern Amu Darya river basin across three provinces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's expected to invest around 550 million euros in the first three years, with the Taliban getting a 20% share of the profits, which will eventually rise to 75%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will be a crucial project for the economy, which has fared poorly since the full Taliban takeover.
